item.description: All boats,yachts, sailboats parade by with different Christmas themes. What a party on the dock. This is adult or family friendly. If this doesnt put you in the holiday spirit nothing will..but dress warm and casual. If youve any questions feel free to email me. If you want to eat there try for reservations now. just going to drink or sip hot chocolate is great too.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Stamford Harbor Parade of Lights@Crabshell
